alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden, central Liberty, northwestern Jefferson and Leon Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway, Woodville, Quincy, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Tallahassee, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Orange, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Cody, Jewel Fire Tower, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Douglas City, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs and Vilas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
